title: Zukkoke Knight: Don De La Mancha
original_name: ずっこけナイト　ドンデラマンチャ
opening_song: "Don de la Ondo Choushi Detemasuka (ドンデラ音頭調子出てますか)" by Fumio Ootsuka (大塚文雄)
ending_song: "Arano no Ichiban Hoshi (荒野の一番星)" by Fumio Ootsuka (大塚文雄)
sinopse: Don Quixote, that infinitely popular character, travels the countryside battling windmills and attempting to win the love of his Dulcinea.
